ModMetaData.name: Titular Royalty
ModMetaData.author: Canon
ModMetaData.description:
Adds titles to the player faction you can grant to your pawns with the Staff of Royalty
(VERSION 1.1)
- Custom Titlelists (VERSION 1.2)
- Custom Titles Support (VERSION 1.2.1)
- Extra Debug Logging (VERSION 1.2.2)
- Patched the Antinium Mod (VERSION 1.3)
- Added Support for 1.4 and alternate Roman Titles (VERSION 1.4)
- Added the Title Manager GUI available on any Vanilla Throne to rename your titles and containing an alternative way to grant them 
- Also allows you to change realm types and custom titles without reloading your colony by pressing the update button in the title manager. (VERSION 1.4.1)
- Vanilla Expanded Framework is no longer Required. (VERSION 1.4.2)
- Fixed not being able to attack with melee weapons
- Better Consort display for the grant titles with staff GUI
